capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, it's not like there's any doubt about that - she's one of the brightest witches of our age and a top student at the school.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've noticed that Harry looks very thin. I'm quite certain about it, and to be honest, it's a bit concerning.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has been looking a bit under the weather lately. He does look very thin, you know? I'm pretty sure it's because he's been really busy with his work and hasn't had time to eat well.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what character is known for being very thin?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him around and he's definitely not as slender as some of our other friends.
Vernon, I think he does look a bit on the heavier side.
capsules_submitted.reply: amazing! vernon's appearance has changed over time, as he used to look tall and bulky but now appears overweight.
